body_html:
Can you create a minimal example that reproduces the problem? I see you have four callbacks, but can you reproduce with only one callback, or even zero callbacks? It's easier to debug issues if the examples are as small and simple as possible.

Also, it's easier to read the post if you put source code in code blocks. I edited your original post to use a code block.
body_text:
Can you create a minimal example that reproduces the problem? I see you have four callbacks, but can you reproduce with only one callback, or even zero callbacks? It's easier to debug issues if the examples are as small and simple as possible.
Also, it's easier to read the post if you put source code in code blocks. I edited your original post to use a code block.
body:
Can you create a minimal example that reproduces the problem? I see you have four callbacks, but can you reproduce with only one callback, or even zero callbacks? It's easier to debug issues if the examples are as small and simple as possible.

Also, it's easier to read the post if you put source code in [code blocks](https://help.github.com/articles/creating-and-highlighting-code-blocks/). I edited your original post to use a code block.
